column4: hmm, so the program i want to "killall" identifies as "java", but there is a second program by the same name in "top" that i don't want to kill...now what?
get the process number and use "kill <pid>"
the process number is the number on the far left in top
prx: ok, so i'll have to make an involved script to find and distinguish the two pid's of the two java processes...
